        Parses the configurations.

        Called each time the configurations are loaded.

        Specified by:

      • setCheckOnStart

        public void setCheckOnStart(boolean checkOnStart)
        Sets whether or not the "check for updates on start up" is enabled.
        Parameters:
        checkOnStart - true if the "check for updates on start up" should be enabled, false otherwise.

      • isCheckOnStart

        public boolean isCheckOnStart()
        Tells whether or not the option "check for updates on start up" is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if check for updates on start up is enabled, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        checkOnStart()

      • checkOnStart

        public boolean checkOnStart()
        Tells whether or not a "check for updates on start up" needs to be performed.

        A check for updates needs to be performed if the method isCheckOnStart() returns true and if no check was already done during the same day.

        Returns:
        true if a check for updates on start up needs to be performed, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        isCheckOnStart()
